personal.name: John Doe
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer
personal.summary: Software engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. Passionate about clean architecture, developer tooling, and mentoring engineering teams.

highlights: Led migration of monolithic application to microservices architecture, reducing deployment time by 70%
Designed and implemented real-time data pipeline processing 2M+ events/day using Kafka and Python
Mentored team of 5 junior engineers through code reviews and weekly knowledge-sharing sessions
Built REST API serving 50k+ daily active users with 99.9% uptime
Introduced CI/CD pipeline with automated testing, reducing production bugs by 40%
Developed internal dashboard used by 200+ employees for operational monitoring
Implemented core features for the company's flagship SaaS product
Collaborated with design team to rebuild the frontend using React
Wrote integration tests that caught 30% more regressions before release

education.notes: Dean's List, Teaching Assistant for Data Structures
